data.name: Minion Masters
data.detailed_description:
Now with Adventures!


A brand new way to play Minion Masters where you go on bold single-player Adventures!
In the first of our adventures you choose among 5 unique Masters, from Fergus Flagon Fighter to the young but powerful Crystal Elf, Milloween.
Gather Minions and find unique Relics to build a completely unique combination, and use that to defat a multitude of bosses in the Minion Masters world.

The story will send you through the Frozen Highlands in search of an ancient artifact; the Mountainshaper.
Every run is a unique experience, varied with new bosses to beat and rewards to reap!
Adventures is a great way to learn Minion Masters as well, and your rewards can be used in the online modes that have already entertained more than a million players.
We’re very excited about this new addition to the game, and are looking forward to your feedback as you play it :)


Living Roadmap


About the Game


Engage in epic 1v1 or 2v2 battles, in this fast-paced strategic minion brawler that's easy to learn but hard to master.
In Minion Masters you choose among many Masters with unique abilities and collect fierce demons, cute creatures, devastating spells and much more.
Utilize your minions to destroy the enemy Master! When a minion has been summoned they can no longer be controlled, so place them wisely to win!

Game Modes

  • 1v1 - Fight against other players and see how far your skills can take you. The rank of Grandmaster awaits if you become the best!
  • 2v2 - Join with your friend or queue up with strangers to take down other teams in intense 2 vs 2 action. Twice the minions, twice the fun!
  • Adventures - Go on daring journeys in this rogue-like single-player mode! Build your deck as you go and create the craziest combos!
  • Draft, Mayhem, Expeditions and Challenges - Various game modes with changing rules, challenging journeys and AI to practice against.

Legendary Masters

Learning to use your Master’s powerful abilities and building your deck around them is crucial for victory! Each Master has their own unique personality and play-style, with opportunities for all kinds of strategies! Only the most determined players can truly master their Master!

Collect Mighty Minions and Spectacular Spells!


Over 150 unique cards (minions, spells, buildings) with more being added all the time!

  • Like the peace-loving Mana Puff, that gives you extra mana when it's happy - which is always!
  • Or the Troubadour, who refuses to do anything but play his bagpipe, making all the other minions attack him regardless of what else is going on just to make it stop...
  • Of course, you could also get the Undying Skeleton who rose from the grave once, but can keep rising! Undead indeed!

Free Quarterly Expansions!


We are constantly adding new content to the game, it is a priority for us that you always have new stuff to experience and master! A lot of our new content comes from regular big expansions containing new cards, skins, avatars, emotes or even new Masters!
Expansions release every three months.

Go on bold single-player Adventures!

In this rogue-like mode you choose a unique Master, gather Minions and find unique Relics to fight a multitude of bosses in the Minion Masters world.
Every run is a unique experience with new bosses to beat and rewards to reap!

Events

We believe in creating a forever fun and engaging experience in Minion Masters, so we regularly spice things up with new events that last for a limited time. They range from challenges, friend events, tournaments, to new game modes, bonus quests and much more.

Community


We have a thriving community in our steam forums, Discord and in-game where both developers and players answer questions, discuss and help you learn the game.
Come join us now!!

Cosmetics


Customize your character with epic skins!



You can even change your side of the playing area to a look that suits you, by swapping your arena with a new one. Want to fight on a lava world? Maybe in a sunken temple? Or a graveyard? There are many options and the choice is yours.

E-Sports

Several community-driven tournaments have emerged around the game. Different tournaments happen every month, some for cash prizes, others for in-game currency or just bragging rights!
Are you the best? Prove it!

You can read more about this and other amazing stuff on our blog: http://blog.betadwarf.com/

Twitch Boost & Drops


With the Twitch feature you can link your Twitch account. Streamers get special matches to earn rewards for viewers through Twitch Drops! We also feature twitch streamers in the game so people can see who is streaming.

Feature List

  • 1v1 Ranked
  • 2v2 Ranked
  • 2v2 premade Ranked
  • Single-player Adventures
  • Draft
  • PvE challenges
  • 10 Masters (More coming soon!)
  • 150+ cards/minions (More coming soon!)
  • Events
  • Active Community
  • E-Sports scene
  • Crafting system
  • Ingame chat and emotes.
  • Recurring stream event
  • Master skins (More coming!)
  • Custom arena skins. (More coming!)
  • Replays!
  • Expeditions!
  • Rapid game updates!
  • Collect your own Arenas!
  • Season rankings!
  • Gorgeous 3D visuals that we are always updating and working on!
  • Pick one of a bajillion strategies
  • Did we mention the Puffs? There’s even a King Puff!

Gameplay description



  • Each player has a pool of mana and a deck of 10 cards (minions/spells/buildings).
    A card can cost between 0-10 mana which regenerates over time during the match.
  • There are 2 bridges in the middle that you need to capture and hold. They generate experience so your hero can level up his abilities before the enemy.
  • You place minions on your side of the arena and the goal is to have them destroy the enemy’s tower.
  • Minions have minds of their own and once you have summoned them, they can no longer be controlled, so place them wisely!
  • Most minions have unique abilities. A few examples of this are: AOE damage, healing, teleporting, mana regen, flying and many more.
  • Spells can be used to change the flow of the game in your favour. Spells such as healing, mind control or stuns can be devastating in the hands of a skilled player.
  • Each hero has unique abilities that change the game drastically as they become active.
  • Awareness, strategy and dedication is needed if you want to become great at the game.

Join in and have fun in our amazing world of Minion Masters!
- The Betadwarf team

data.short_description: Dive into 1v1 battle - or bring a friend for 2v2 - in this dangerously addictive fast-paced hybrid of deckbuilder, MOBA, and tower-defense.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Is this by those Forced Showdown guys?! Is this the greatest game of all time?”
Penny Arcade

“It's really slick. It plays really really well.”
Total Biscuit

“Better than any other game of its kind that I have ever seen.”
Kripparian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12.4+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
